## Vector4.subtractToRef() method

Sets the given vector "result" with the result of the subtraction of the given vector from the current Vector4.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subtractToRef(otherVector: ReadOnlyVector4, result: Vector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherVector | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | the vector to subtract |
|  result | <code>Vector4</code> | the vector to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the current Vector4.
